channel.title: Updates on Xenon
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Xenon

item.title: XVM
item.description: I have begun work on a code generation backend called XVM. The IR is basically assembly, but it compiles platform independently. XVM will be avalible on crates.io soon. Sorry for the delays on new stuff for Xenon.

item.title: Documentation Added!
item.description: I have added some documentation of the Xenon syntax to the website under the Docs link which should be avalible at the top of your screen now! Please reach out to me on discord at the username applepieonrye if you notice any mistakes!

item.title: Website Created!
item.description:
Xenon now has a website!

Expect updates here when something cool happens.
